abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise the expansion
            of COSIPA's production capacity from about 1.0 to 2.3
            million metric tons of raw steel per year to produce about
            1.7 million tons of flat rolled products. The new facilities
            will include extension of the existing dock and a second
            unloader, two 53-cell coke oven batteries, a blast furnace,
            a new basic oxygen plant, modification of the existing
            slabbing mill, a heavy plate mill, alterations and additions
            to the existing hot and cold strip mills, a new electric
            power distribution system, additional mobile equipment and
            rolling stock and ancillary equipment.
